content.raw: Yes, configuring the install prefix for cmake in ign-sensor fixed the issue. LGTM
content.html: Yes, configuring the install prefix for cmake in ign-sensor fixed the issue. LGTM

content.raw:
It’s probably not finding the ign-sensors plugins. Where are the ign-sensors libs installed to?  

you can take a look at [pipelines setup](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/src/ce92463da81fec29dbdfc838162d4d3a6e56d026/bitbucket-pipelines.yml) which is working now. See if there’s something different.
content.html:
It’s probably not finding the ign-sensors plugins. Where are the ign-sensors libs installed to?

you can take a look at pipelines setup which is working now. See if there’s something different.
